Virtuoso Layout Suite XL: Basic Editing Frequently Asked Questions
How do I enable the Used option in the Layers panel of the Palette assistant for every layout view that I open?
How can I ensure that a specific layer is used to trace the net using the Mark Net functionality?
How can I change the number of rows and columns during a subsequent Copy operation?
How can I replace cellviews hierarchically in a design?
How can I list the hierarchy from top to bottom?
When I stretch a path that overlaps a shape, why does the path remain connected to the shape?
Why does the Zoom In command take a long time to refresh the layout if the layout has multiple large sized rulers?
How can I set the Auto mode in the Create Label command as the default label creation mode? Also, why do we need to press F3 to display the Create Label form?
When I create pins, why are the labels not being displayed?
How can I create pins by reading data from a text file?
How can I set the default via on the Create Via form
How can I map the parameters on the System tab while creating a custom via?
How can I set the default value for viaRows and viaColumns to two cuts?
Why does the ruler disappear from screen when I save the design if the Save Rulers option is not selected?
How can I cycle through the snapping targets in the Create Ruler command?
How can I find the cds environment variables corresponding to the fields in the Display Options and Layout Editor Options forms?
How can I define the layout cellview Selection Box?
